verses.verse: "Now it shall be, if <S%H518><s%> you will diligently <S%H8085><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> being <S%H8104><s%> careful <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> you high <S%H5945><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"And all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> blessings <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon you and overtake <S%H5381><s%> you, if <S%H3588><s%> you will obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
"Blessed <S%H1288><s%> [shall] you [be] in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> [shall] you [be] in the country. <S%H7704><s%>

"Blessed <S%H1288><s%> [shall be] the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%> and the produce <S%H6529><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%> and the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your beasts, <S%H929><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your herd <S%H504><s%> and the young <S%H6251><s%> of your flock. <S%H6629><s%>
"Blessed <S%H1288><s%> [shall be] your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your kneading <S%H4863><s%> bowl. <S%H4863><s%>
"Blessed <S%H1288><s%> [shall] you [be] when you come <S%H935><s%> in, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> [shall] you [be] when you go <S%H3318><s%> out.

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will cause <S%H5414><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> who rise <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> you to be defeated <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; they shall come <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H413><s%> you one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> and shall flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> ways. <S%H1870><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon you in your barns <S%H618><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> that you put <S%H9303><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to, and He will bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you.

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will establish <S%H6965><s%> you as a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to Himself, as He swore <S%H7650><s%> to you, if <S%H3588><s%> you will keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> in His ways. <S%H1870><s%>

"So all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that you are called <S%H7121><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of you.

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will make you abound <S%H3498><s%> in prosperity, <S%H9186><s%> in the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%> and in the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your beast <S%H929><s%> and in the produce <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers to give <S%H1><s%> you.

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will open <S%H6605><s%> for you His good <S%H2896><s%> storehouse, <S%H214><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> to your land <S%H776><s%> in its season <S%H6256><s%> and to bless <S%H1288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you shall lend <S%H9233><s%> to many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> but you shall not borrow. <S%H9233><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> you the head <S%H7218><s%> and not the tail, <S%H2180><s%> and you only <S%H7534><s%> shall be above, <S%H4605><s%> and you shall not be underneath, <S%H4295><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> you will listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I charge <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> [them] carefully, <S%H6213><s%>

and do not turn <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> from any <S%H3605><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them.

"But it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about, if <S%H518><s%> you will not obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> and His statutes <S%H2708><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> I charge <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon you and overtake <S%H5381><s%> you.
"Cursed <S%H779><s%> [shall] you [be] in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and cursed <S%H779><s%> [shall] you [be] in the country. <S%H7704><s%>
"Cursed <S%H779><s%> [shall be] your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your kneading <S%H4863><s%> bowl. <S%H4863><s%>

"Cursed <S%H779><s%> [shall be] the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%> and the produce <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your herd <S%H504><s%> and the young <S%H6251><s%> of your flock. <S%H6629><s%>
"Cursed <S%H779><s%> [shall] you [be] when you come <S%H935><s%> in, and cursed <S%H779><s%> [shall] you [be] when you go <S%H3318><s%> out.

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> upon you curses, <S%H3994><s%> confusion, <S%H4103><s%> and rebuke, <S%H4045><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> you undertake <S%H3027><s%> <S%H9303><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you are destroyed <S%H8045><s%> and until <S%H5704><s%> you perish quickly, <S%H6><s%> on account <S%H4118><s%> <S%H4480><s%> of the evil <S%H6440><s%> of your deeds, <S%H7455><s%> because <S%H4611><s%> you have forsaken <S%H834><s%> Me.

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will make the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> cling <S%H1692><s%> to you until <S%H5704><s%> He has consumed <S%H3615><s%> you from the land, <S%H127><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are entering <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> you with consumption <S%H7829><s%> and with fever <S%H6920><s%> and with inflammation <S%H1816><s%> and with fiery <S%H2746><s%> heat <S%H2746><s%> and with the sword <S%H2719><s%> and with blight <S%H9584><s%> and with mildew, <S%H3420><s%> and they shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> you until <S%H5704><s%> you perish.

"And the heaven <S%H8064><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is over <S%H5921><s%> your head <S%H7218><s%> shall be bronze, <S%H5178><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is under <S%H8478><s%> you, iron. <S%H1270><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> powder <S%H80><s%> and dust; <S%H6083><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> it shall come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on you until <S%H5704><s%> you are destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will cause <S%H5414><s%> you to be defeated <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies; <S%H340><s%> you shall go <S%H3318><s%> out one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> against <S%H413><s%> them, but you shall flee <S%H5127><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and you shall be [an example of] terror <S%H2113><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"And your carcasses <S%H5038><s%> shall be food <S%H3978><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> and to the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> shall be no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to frighten <S%H2729><s%> [them] away. <S%H2729><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> you with the boils <S%H7822><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and with tumors <S%H9425><s%> and with the scab <S%H1618><s%> and with the itch, <S%H9174><s%> from which <S%H834><s%> you cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be healed. <S%H7495><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> you with madness <S%H7697><s%> and with blindness <S%H5788><s%> and with bewilderment <S%H8541><s%> of heart; <S%H3824><s%>

and you shall grope <S%H4959><s%> at noon, <S%H6672><s%> as the blind <S%H5787><s%> man <S%H5787><s%> gropes <S%H4959><s%> in darkness, <S%H653><s%> and you shall not prosper <S%H6743><s%> in your ways; <S%H1870><s%> but you shall only <S%H389><s%> be oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and robbed <S%H1497><s%> continually, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> with none <S%H369><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> you.

"You shall betroth <S%H781><s%> a wife, <S%H802><s%> but another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall violate <S%H7693><s%> her; you shall build <S%H1129><s%> a house, <S%H1004><s%> but you shall not live <S%H3427><s%> in it; you shall plant <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> but you shall not use <S%H2490><s%> its fruit. <S%H2490><s%>

"Your ox <S%H7794><s%> shall be slaughtered <S%H2873><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of it; your donkey <S%H2543><s%> shall be torn <S%H1497><s%> away <S%H1497><s%> from you, and shall not be restored <S%H7725><s%> to you; your sheep <S%H6629><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to your enemies, <S%H340><s%> and you shall have <S%H369><s%> none <S%H369><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> you.

"Your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> while your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%> on and yearn <S%H3616><s%> for them continually <S%H3605><s%>; <S%H3117><s%> but there <S%H369><s%> shall be nothing <S%H369><s%> you can do. <S%H3027><s%>

"A people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you do not know <S%H3045><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> up the produce <S%H6529><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your labors, <S%H3018><s%> and you shall never <S%H7534><s%> be anything <S%H7534><s%> but oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> continually. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
"And you shall be driven <S%H7696><s%> mad <S%H7696><s%> by the sight <S%H4758><s%> of what <S%H834><s%> you see. <S%H7200><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will strike <S%H5221><s%> you on the knees <S%H1290><s%> and legs <S%H7785><s%> with sore <S%H7451><s%> boils, <S%H7822><s%> from which <S%H834><s%> you cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be healed, <S%H7495><s%> from the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> to the crown <S%H6936><s%> of your head. <S%H6936><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H1980><s%> you and your king, <S%H4428><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you shall set <S%H6965><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, to a nation <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> you nor <S%H3808><s%> your fathers have known, <S%H1><s%> and there <S%H3045><s%> you shall serve <S%H8033><s%> other <S%H5647><s%> gods, <S%H312><s%> wood <S%H430><s%> and stone. <S%H6086><s%>

"And you shall become <S%H1961><s%> a horror, <S%H8047><s%> a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> and a taunt <S%H8148><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will drive <S%H5090><s%> you.

"You shall bring <S%H3318><s%> out much <S%H7227><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%> but you shall gather <S%H622><s%> in little, <S%H4592><s%> for the locust <S%H697><s%> shall consume <S%H2628><s%> it.

"You shall plant <S%H5193><s%> and cultivate <S%H5647><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> but you shall neither <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of the wine <S%H3196><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> gather <S%H103><s%> [the grapes,] for the worm <S%H9641><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them.

"You shall have <S%H1961><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> trees <S%H2132><s%> throughout <S%H3605><s%> your territory <S%H1366><s%> but you shall not anoint <S%H5480><s%> yourself with the oil, <S%H8081><s%> for your olives <S%H2132><s%> shall drop <S%H5394><s%> off. <S%H5394><s%>
"You shall have <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%> but they shall not be yours, for they shall go <S%H1980><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>
"The cricket <S%H9488><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your trees <S%H6086><s%> and the produce <S%H6529><s%> of your ground. <S%H127><s%>

"The alien <S%H1616><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you shall rise <S%H5927><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> you higher <S%H4605><s%> and higher, <S%H4605><s%> but you shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> lower <S%H4295><s%> and lower. <S%H4295><s%>
"He shall lend <S%H9233><s%> to you, but you shall not lend <S%H9233><s%> to him; he shall be the head, <S%H7218><s%> and you shall be the tail. <S%H2180><s%>

"So all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you and pursue <S%H7291><s%> you and overtake <S%H5381><s%> you until <S%H5704><s%> you are destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you would not obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> by keeping <S%H8104><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> and His statutes <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.
"And they shall become <S%H1961><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> and a wonder <S%H4159><s%> on you and your descendants <S%H2233><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

"Because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> you did not serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with joy <S%H8057><s%> and a glad <S%H2898><s%> heart, <S%H3824><s%> for the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> things; <S%H3605><s%>

therefore you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> against you, in hunger, <S%H7458><s%> in thirst, <S%H6772><s%> in nakedness, <S%H5903><s%> and in the lack <S%H2640><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> things; <S%H3605><s%> and He will put <S%H5414><s%> an iron <S%H1270><s%> yoke <S%H5923><s%> on your neck <S%H6677><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> He has destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you.

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will bring <S%H5375><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you from afar, <S%H7350><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> as the eagle <S%H5404><s%> swoops <S%H1675><s%> down, <S%H1675><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> language <S%H3956><s%> you shall not understand, <S%H8085><s%>

a nation <S%H1471><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> countenance <S%H6440><s%> who <S%H834><s%> shall have <S%H5375><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> respect <S%H6440><s%> for the old, <S%H2205><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> show <S%H2603><s%> favor <S%H2603><s%> to the young. <S%H5288><s%>

"Moreover, it shall eat <S%H398><s%> the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your herd <S%H929><s%> and the produce <S%H6529><s%> of your ground <S%H127><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you are destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> who <S%H834><s%> also leaves <S%H7604><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> grain, <S%H1715><s%> new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> or oil, <S%H3323><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your herd <S%H504><s%> or the young <S%H6251><s%> of your flock <S%H6629><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they have caused you to perish.

"And it shall besiege <S%H9503><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your towns <S%H8179><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> your high <S%H1364><s%> and fortified <S%H1219><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you trusted <S%H982><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> throughout <S%H3605><s%> your land, <S%H776><s%> and it shall besiege <S%H9503><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your towns <S%H8179><s%> throughout <S%H3605><s%> your land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you.

"Then you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your own body, <S%H990><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> and of your daughters <S%H1323><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you, during the siege <S%H4692><s%> and the distress <S%H4689><s%> by which <S%H834><s%> your enemy <S%H340><s%> shall oppress <S%H6693><s%> you.

"The man <S%H376><s%> who is refined <S%H7390><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> delicate <S%H6028><s%> among you shall be hostile <S%H7489><s%> toward his brother <S%H251><s%> and toward the wife <S%H802><s%> he cherishes <S%H2436><s%> and toward the rest <S%H3499><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> who <S%H834><s%> remain, <S%H3498><s%>
